entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
